channel.title: Server 508 coding
channel.description:
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:
ok ive seen a lack of 508 coding on these forums nonetheless other forums aswell.
now, i have pur3zscape 508 source.
im getting a little pissy on how in the hell im supposed to code it
1. new home- edgeville
2. fix commands- ipban, ipmute, ban
3. make edge wildy 1 v 1
4. get alot of people on my server
---------------now.--------------------
if anybody can help that would be great,
just give me simple instruction on either one or all of my problems
name what number it is
last but not least,
thanks for helping, :D :D :D
the zerker h0-junior member. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 10:01:08 am[/size][hr]sorry for double posting

item.title: Server 508 coding
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

Well, you need three things:

  1. Common Sense.
  2. Basic knowledge of Java.
  3. Basic knowledge of how the Runescape protocol works.

Unless you have a more detailed request, we can’t help you with any more than that.

Read full topic
